data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Kulgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 23,340 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kulgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the county of Kulgam. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next week in Kulgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, grace the churches in Kulgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Kulgam to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Galleban people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Kulgam that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Kulgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary:
the county of Kulgam, Jammu and Kashmir, India has a population of 23,600.

We estimate Kulgam has 260 people who might know Jesus, 286 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 23,054 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 260 believers in the county of Kulgam the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

location.name: Kulgam
